name: boston
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the capital and largest city of the northeastern US state of Massachusetts and one of the oldest cities in the US: He was working as a chef in Boston. She flew from Boston to Tampa.
More examplesFewer examplesI came to Boston more than 20 years ago.They live near Boston's airport.We went to a fish restaurant in Boston harbour.
